thread.title: Blue Ivy Wears Pink Gucci Suit Red Carpet - Blue Ivy Grammys 2017
thread.title_full: Blue Ivy Wears Pink Gucci Suit at the 2017 Grammy Awards Red Carpet - Blue Ivy Grammys 2017

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Blue Ivy Wears Pink Gucci Suit Red Carpet - Blue Ivy Grammys 2017

organizations.name: blue ivy wears pink gucci suit red carpet

text: Just in case you got a little too excited about Beyoncé's twins, Blue Ivy Carter showed up at the Grammys tonight to remind us all that she's still the boss of the family. The 5-year-old was spotted sitting front row with dad Jay Z in a pink Gucci suit and ruffle blouse. She topped off the look with a red glitter cat purse, as one does. Twitter users pointed out that her look was reminiscent to Prince's purple suit and Victorian blouse:
